## GlobalContexts.removeGlobalContexts() method

Removes previously added global context, performs a deep comparison of the contexts or conditional contexts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeGlobalContexts(contexts: Array<ConditionalContextProvider | ContextPrimitive | string>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  contexts | Array&lt;ConditionalContextProvider \| ContextPrimitive \| string&gt; | An Array of either Condition Contexts or Primitive Contexts |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
